name: RFOX
tagline: Our vision is to be the global leader in immersive metaverse experiences focused on retail, media, gaming, & rewards
description:
RFOX was founded in 2018 with the purpose to be one of the world?s foremost metaverse builders.

Our mission is to empower everyone to play, create and earn in an immersive metaverse without borders.  

We are creating a metaverse that acts as a platform connecting whitelabel services in one central hub. Businesses and creators can tap into tools for finance, gaming, VR, NFTs, e-commerce and retail and market to a ready-made audience of users.
